title: Give Zac some love please...
body:
It has only recently struck me with him being free to play this week, but Zac has only two skins; his classic and his purple one (can't remember the name).

Zac has been released for two years now, you'd think that they would have made another skin for him.

Riot, please make Zac another skin. He is a goo monster for crying out loud, I can think up of at least three on the spot right here.

Lava Zac
Pool party Zac (he is blue)
Quicksilver Zac (liquid metal)

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EB3TN9TF,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-12T13:17:58.955+0000)
>
> It has only recently struck me with him being free to play this week, but Zac has only two skins; his classic and his purple one (can't remember the name).
> 
> Zac has been released for two years now, you'd think that they would have made another skin for him.
> 
> Riot, please make Zac another skin. He is a goo monster for crying out loud, I can think up of at least three on the spot right here.
> 
> Lava Zac
> Pool party Zac (he is blue)
> Quicksilver Zac (liquid metal)


> [{quoted}](name=DiamondAries,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EB3TN9TF,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-03-12T13:17:58.955+0000)
>
> It has only recently struck me with him being free to play this week, but Zac has only two skins; his classic and his purple one (can't remember the name).
> 
> Zac has been released for two years now, you'd think that they would have made another skin for him.
> 
> Riot, please make Zac another skin. He is a goo monster for crying out loud, I can think up of at least three on the spot right here.
> 
> Lava Zac
> Pool party Zac (he is blue)
> Quicksilver Zac (liquid metal)

He doesn't... he doesn't have skin. He's just goo. Riot tries and no.

Aviator Zac - Rides clouds from rainbow. Or Transparent Zac < That'd look sick.
Nah, that would be OP, how can you fight a tank you can't see? You'd just get CC'd but a health bar and it's like "wut"

> Pool party Zac

I second this.

All he needs is a suit. 

> purple one (can't remember the name)

Special Weapon if I recall correctly 


Also I just found out the way they got the noise for his bouncing effects...

But he is also in Riven's bunny splash as a background character, give him a suit for both Riven's and his sake.

Yeah, it would be cool to have Zac in a suit in a reference to his want of one. I just don't understand why he doesn't have a second skin yet. He is a blob, and can be made out of any liquid possible. Also, they could change his colour and that would be an awesome skin in itself.

I just got an idea for another skin

Rainbow Zac; when he uses an ability he changes to a random colour.
But when he gets the deep blue/sky blue mix I wont wanna change D:
Sugar Rush Zac for Halloween please!!!

I'm not actually a fan of that sort of skin. I personally don't like any of those celebratory skins, especially Surprise Party Fiddlesticks.

Also - call me weird - but I also don't like the skins that are intended to make the female champs sexy, like Battle Bunny Riven or Kitty Kat Katerina. I mean, how is it practical to have an awesome sword wielding bruiser wearing Playboy stuff?
He has a new [skin](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Yl8ldeXs2yg) coming out anyway :^)
